metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16927 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Xpdf 4.01.01 has an out-of-bounds write in the vertProfile part of the TextPage::findGaps function in TextOutputDev.cc, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-9877.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler doesn't have TextPage::findGaps, no indication it is vulnerable to this issue ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
